features.title: Responsive
features.description: And ready for what comes next. Formstone components are designed mobile-first to ensure fast, usable interfaces, no matter the screen size.

features.title: Modular
features.description: Maintaining a project means adding functionality as it matures. Components are name-spaced for minimal overlap with your existing styles and scripts.

features.title: Lightweight
features.description: Components are minified and dependencies kept to a minimum so your site loads quickly and reliably for every user.

features.title: Open Source
features.description: Missing a feature? Notice a bug in IE 10? Components are MIT Licensed and individually maintained so you can give a little back or make them your own.

features.title: Code Standards
features.description: Formstone components are compiled with Grunt and deployable with Bower to ensure code quality and maintain simple implementation.

features.title: Browser Support
features.description: The web is larger then WebKit and Formstone helps to achieve cross browser support for your site, while maintaining the interactions users expect.
